review_text: I thought it would be great. I have Black & Decker that does a better job. It also has a small prep bowl. My big Cuisinart broke so I thought for a small size it would be good. Did not even crush wet beans or move it to the top as said. It was to late for me to return it.
product_name: Cuisinart DLC-1 Mini-Prep Food Processor, White
